name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sunset Over Flower Field Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in nature’s beauty with the Sunset Over Flower Field Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a breathtaking scene of golden sunsets illuminating endless flower fields.

Feel the serenity of the outdoors, brought to life with mesmerizing animations every time you open your browser.

Features:
🌅 Live Wallpaper: Stunning visuals of a glowing sunset over a vibrant flower field.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites with pre-set shortcuts.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links to frequently visited sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Effortlessly browse the web with your preferred search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This lightweight, secure extension ensures smooth functionality, respects your privacy, and can be easily uninstalled anytime via settings.

Discover more live wallpapers featuring serene landscapes, nature-inspired scenes, and artistic visuals. Additional tools include a note-taking feature, a privacy policy, and a direct uninstall option.

Download the Sunset Over Flower Field Live Wallpaper now and enjoy the peaceful beauty of nature in every new tab. Explore even more unique extensions on our website!
